changelog: Fix suggestion in `manual_range_contains` when using float

files.patch:
@@ -72,5 +72,17 @@ error: manual `!RangeInclusive::contains` implementation
 LL |     999 < x || 1 > x;
    |     ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ help: use: `!(1..=999).contains(&x)`
